title: Mary Chinery-Hesse appointed Chancellor of Legon

quotes: In the course of my association with Mr J. H. Mensah in the early 80s in New York, during his days in exile and his leadership within the Ghana Democratic Movement (GDM), a political activist group opposing the PNDC of Ghana, I found him to be a very phenomenal character.

organizations.name: University of Ghana
quotes: Ms. Chinery-Hesse received a BA (Hons) in Sociology and Economics, and Doctor of Laws (Honoris causa) from the University of Ghana;

organizations.name: University of Dublin
quotes: and postgraduate training in Development Economics at the University of Dublin.

quotes: The publisher of Ghandot and its readers wish Ms. Mary Chinnery Hesse a successful term as the Chancelot of Ghana’s premier university.
